jasbro.game.world.customContent.effects..message: You and Naruto stare at each other. After a while he just grins and rubs the back of his head with one hand. "Oh this is awkward." You ask him what the hell he is doing here. "Well you see, Hinata and I travelled around. I wanted to introduce her to my family. But my parents aren't around anymore and the other's aren't really nice to humans. So that didn't go so well." He sighs. "Then we tried to live among humans, but wherever we went people chased us off when they found out what I am."

"So in the end we ended up back here. There are actually quite a lot of monsters living here, but you need someone to vouch for you and Hinata is just a normal citizen. So we are looking for someone, who can do that for me. Also Hinata didn't feel too well this morning. She said she is fine, but I can small that there is something different about her so now I want to earn some money for a doctor..." Naruto has gone into full rambling mode, he doesn't even seem to take breaths between his sentences. "Hey! I could work for you! We both could once Hinata is feeling better!" You blink.

You ask if this would really be ok considering their past and if they would be comfortable doing that kind of work.
"I am sure it will be fine! Hinata and I will do our best and learn everything there is to know!"
Even though you are sure that Naruto doesn't quite know what he is getting into, you are not in the mood to argue and simply agree.

The two of you go and visit Hinata in the small flat the two have rented. The girl greets you warmly, all misgivings from your past seemingly forgotten since you decided to let them go. Hinata seems to be fine as far as you can tell. But if Naruto smelled something about her, maybe there is something going on?
You promise them to take care of everything and make your way to the Trainer's Guild to get them sorted out.
Naruto is working for you now, but he is trying to keep his nature a secret from people. Seems like you will have to make do without his demonic powers for now.
